component.name: Subsound
component.summary: Stream music from your Navidrome or Subsonic server

description.p: Subsound is a GTK4/Adwaita music player for Subsonic-compatible streaming servers, with Navidrome as the primary target. It lets you browse artists, albums, and playlists from your personal music server and plays them back directly or from a local cache.

ul.li: Browse and play music from Navidrome or any Subsonic-compatible server
Offline playback from a local song cache
MPRIS2 media player integration for desktop media controls
Starred songs and downloaded songs views
Native GTK4/Adwaita interface designed for GNOME
